ygData.subject: Pixie Strike and the finger
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFL on Gomer. My favorite from him is the classic joke line: IT AIN T MY FINGER EITHER!!!! I definitely think we are getting much more than the finger.  Hehe.
ygData.messageBody:
ROFL on Gomer.

My favorite from him is the classic joke line:

IT AIN'T MY FINGER EITHER!!!!

I definitely think we are getting much more than the finger. Hehe.

Anyway, I am the penultimate optimist(did I use that word right?). I just
can't help being hopeful. I am still having fun and that's what's
important. This list is a large component of my fun. I very much
appreciate all the information, humor and sharing we do. Out of all the
eGroups list I subscribe to, this is by far the most active. With it, I can
have a little EQ during the long days.

Thanks all,

Piemur

PS - I included some of the recent postings for clarity. I hope I am not
too far off topic. Hehe.
________________________________________________________________________

Message: 3
Date: Tue, 24 Oct 2000 12:33:46 -0700
From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>
Subject: RE: Pixie Fix???

Has John(tm) once told me, 'Your problem is you still have hope".

If they do fix it so we can keep 2-3 mobs locked down I will be one of the
first to thank them.

I am not getting my hopes up.

Rokenn

> ----------
> From: Cook Miller-ETOP03[SMTP:etop03@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Sent: Tuesday, October 24, 2000 11:56 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Pixie Fix???
>
> One can only hope. Realizing Rokenn has been around the block (and taken
> into the alley and pummeled once or twice), I can understand his cynicism.
> But just maybe....
>
> BTW, does anyone know when the next patch is scheduled? Can't do web at
> work = (.
>
> Piemur Draggonsinger
> 35 Songs
> The Nameless

Fool me once shame on you. Fool me twice shame on me.

I for one do not expect to see any improvements made to the bard class ever
again. Much easier to not get disappointed/frustrated when your
expectations are low to start with.

Galtin of E'ci (bet you thought this was Kitasi posting:-)

of the reasons I got so angry with them when Ester
said she'd look into it is because I allowed myself to

Rokenn and I would both bet against it and will be
pleasently surprised if they fix it. But I'm not
holding my breath...
